name: The Intruder!
description:
Experience a home invasion this brand new text-based thriller. You must try and escape the house, but be careful - things are not what they appear.

You're taking a shower when suddenly you hear a loud noise downstairs. Do you check it out, or do you pretend you didn't hear anything? Choose carefully, for every choice you make has consequences.

Can you escape The Intruder?

-Click on the screen to speed through the lengthy text!
-No Ads
-No in-app purchases
-No intrusive popups

After the initial purchase, you get to enjoy the comfort and freedom of a premium app, one that runs and performs well and allows you to escape reality and relax, with no interruptions, no buffering, and no pleading. EVER.
